name: Marcus O'Snail
description:
Imagine a blazing fast snail with super human strength and the ability to fly!

That is not Marcus, but Marcus has other qualities. He is kind, reliable, can alter gravity and he is a good listener.

Controls:

Keyboard: WASD
Touch: Hold and drag
Gamepad: D-pad or left stick

The game and all the assets were made on a smartphone.
